name: ON A MOON
description:
Note: ClamBucket Games is a made up Game Studio for T-624-CGDD course at Reykjavik University, Fall 2020.

Description

On A Moon is a single-player game made for a project in the course T-624-CGDD at Reykjavik University, Fall 2020.

Context 

You are an astronaut from the Clam Aeronautics and Space Association, from the planet Clamo. You and your crew were sent on an exploration mission to a distant galaxy but you unexpectedly crashed on a remote moon of an unknown planet, rendering the spaceship unusable and you the only survivor. After the crash, you find yourself in a dire situation as you are bombarded by hoards of unknown hostile creatures that supposedly inhabit this moon. You must defend yourself from the hoards until CASA rescue arrives.

Gameplay 

Fight off the creatures and try to survive until rescue arrives. Punch, Swing and Shoot them to death and try to avoid them as you take damage if they get too close to you. CASA will send you permanent weapons and deployable equipment that aid you in the fight. Health and Shield kits will be sent to you after some rounds too.  Good Luck!

   

Controls 

The game is designed to be played using a keyboard and mouse. You have the option of only using the keyboard are both keyboard and mouse. 

Move Up[ W ]Move Down[ S ]Move Left[ A ]Move Right[ D ]Jump[ SPACE ]Attack[ P ] or ( Left Mouse ) Pick Up Item[ E ]Use Equipment[ F ] or ( Right Mouse )Cycle Thru Weapons[ 1 ] , [ 2 ] , [ 3 ]PauseDouble Press [ ESC ] Attributions
